t: Brand Stores: Create a brand page on Amazon for free | Amazon Ads
s: Brand Stores help build brand awareness by showcasing your brand and product catalog on your own Amazon web address. You can create a Brand Store at no additional cost—with no coding necessary.

t: Amazon Brand Registry | Sell on Amazon

t: r/FulfillmentByAmazon on Reddit: Best Of The Big Brands Selling On Amazon?

s: What makes Amazon stand out from many of the world's most valuable retail brands is its focus on e-commerce and the platform's extensive global availability. While U.S.-based competitors such as Walmart mainly operate in North America, Amazon serves millions of users across the globe.
